mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "categoryId", a.code AS "code", a.goods AS "goods", a.amount AS "amount", a.number AS "number", a.tax AS "tax", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: insert into ad_return_detail ( id, return_flow_id, category_id, code, goods, amount, number, create_by, del_flag, remarks, tax, update_date, update_by, create_date ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{returnFlowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
